text: Kalaranjini (born 17 August 1962) is an Indian actress and classical dancer who started her career in the early 1980s. She is the elder sister of actress Urvashi and actress Kalpana. She was a successful heroine of the 1980s and has lately been appearing in television serials including Daya, Velankanni Mathavu, Devimahatymam and Kumkumappoovu. ==Personal life== Kalaranjini was born to theatre artists Chavara V. P. Nair and Vijayalakshmi.http://www.manoramaonline.com/cgi- bin/MMOnline.dll/portal/ep/malayalamContentView.do?contentId=17227495&BV;_ID=@@@&tabId;=5 She has 2 younger sisters Urvashi and Kalpana. Her two brothers Kamal Roy and Prince, died at the ages of 17 and 27, respectively.
